task_type: Bug Fix - Insulation Applications Component - RESOLVED
task_description: Successfully fixed image paths by using lowercase /images/ as configured in build process

explanation: The build process copies src/Images to /images/ (lowercase) in the output
Previous attempts used /Images/ (uppercase) which doesn't exist in built site
Services-preview was working differently or had cached version

solution_implemented.change: Updated all image paths from /Images/ to /images/ (lowercase)
solution_implemented.verification: Paths now match build output configuration

lessons_learned.key_insight: Always check build configuration files (.eleventy.js) for path transformations
lessons_learned.pattern_identified: ICA project uses lowercase /images/ in production despite uppercase /Images/ in source
lessons_learned.best_practice: Use lowercase /images/ for all image references in components

verification_needed.expected_result: All 6 insulation type images should display
